statements: SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_title, response_data FROM SurveyData WHERE respondent_id = 100;
SELECT survey_id, survey_title FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_title LIKE 'Feedback%';
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM SurveyData GROUP BY survey_id HAVING total_responses > 5;
SELECT survey_id, survey_title, respondent_id FROM SurveyData WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, survey_questions->'question_1', survey_questions->'question_2' FROM SurveyData WHERE respondent_id = 2;
SELECT survey_id, survey_title, response_data->>'answer_1' FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM SurveyData;
SELECT survey_title, respondent_id, response_data->>'answer_3' AS question_3_response FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, survey_topic FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM responses WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT survey_name, survey_topic, survey_date FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT response_id, survey_id, participant_id, response_date FROM responses;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses WHERE participant_id = 10 AND survey_id = 1
SELECT survey_topic, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_name = 'Customer Satisfaction'
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date ASC
SELECT survey_name, survey_topic, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT question, answer FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_name, email, phone_number FROM survey_respondents ORDER BY respondent_name DESC;
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_result FROM survey_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, question, answer, response_date FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 5 ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data
SELECT question, answer, response_date FROM survey_data ORDER BY response_date DESC
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name, email FROM survey_respondents WHERE respondent_id = 1
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_result FROM survey_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT respondent_name, phone_number FROM survey_respondents INNER JOIN survey_data ON survey_respondents.respondent_id = survey_data.respondent_id ORDER BY respondent_name ASC
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name, question_count FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT MAX(question_count) AS max_questions FROM surveys;
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, question_count FROM surveys;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_participants.participant_name, survey_responses.response_text FROM survey_participants JOIN survey_responses ON survey_participants.survey_id = survey_responses.survey_id;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM surveys LEFT JOIN survey_responses ON surveys.survey_id = survey_responses.survey_id GROUP BY survey_name;
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_name, question, answer FROM survey_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT respondent_id, gender, age FROM survey_respondent WHERE age > 30;
SELECT result_id, survey_id, question, answer FROM survey_results WHERE result_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT trigger_name, action, trigger_condition FROM survey_triggers ORDER BY trigger_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE respondent_id = 10;
SELECT question, answer FROM survey_results WHERE result_id = 5;
SELECT name, email, age FROM survey_respondent WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_type, script FROM survey_procedures WHERE procedure_id = 2;
SELECT survey_name, question, answer FROM survey_data JOIN survey_results ON survey_data.id = survey_results.survey_id;
